title.rendered: Received application for listing – Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA

content.rendered:
Oslo Børs has received a request for admission to trading from Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA on Oslo Børs alternatively Oslo Axess.

The disclosure of information requirement set out in sections 5-1, 5-2 and 5-3 of the Securities Trading Act, will apply from the time a request for admission to trading on the stock exchange has been made.

The company is conducting a fast-track listing process.

Company information:

Name: AqualisBraemar Holding ASA
Ticker: will be published later
ISIN: NO0010715394
